item.description:
"How to Tell a Kick Butt 5 Minute Story" with Andrea Lovett co founder of massmouth.

 Come and enjoy a fun and thoughtful two-hour workshop to cultivate a story based on personal experience into a performance. This workshop is a great introduction for beginner storytellers into the art-from of storytelling.


In this workshop you will begin to learn how storytelling differs from theater, stand up, or twisting balloon animals. With the instruction and coaching ofmassmouth professional storytellers you will explore the art of story telling through guided sense memory, writing, performance, individual and group exercises.

 Limited to 16 and minimum of 6 to run. Please arrive by 6:15 to sign in workshop begins at 6:30 pm. 

 pay in advance or at the door

http://massmouth.eventbrite.com/?s=2480369

$40.00  online and $45.00 at door. 

 you  must send a request to register  to andrea@massmouth.com



Andrea Lovett; professional storyteller, performance coach, and story lover.
http://andrealovett.blogspot.com/

group.name: CLOSING DOWN THIS MEETUP GROUP: massmouth storytellers

item.name: How to Tell a Kickbutt 5 minute Story Workshop
